channel.title: About on Dr. Elliot
channel.description: Recent content in About on Dr. Elliot

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hello, and welcome to my blog! I’m a self-taught programmer with a deep curiosity for how things work under the hood. Most of my time these days is spent on Lumina, my custom C++ game engine, a long-term project that combines my love for systems programming, graphics, and engine architecture. Before Lumina, I released several projects built with Unreal Engine, which you can find on Steam: The Other Side Just War Trains Egg Game Beyond Development Outside of programming, I’m a lifelong gamer inspired by the atmosphere and storytelling of classics like Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas.
